message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. This is a fair price considering its value to both of us. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $750,000 is simply not workable for me.  I'm willing to come down to $850,000, which still allows me to make a profit while being fair to your needs. Let's close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $775,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to get as close to $800,000 as possible.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $775,000 is simply not enough for me to move forward. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $825,000. This is a significant compromise on my end, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement. Let's make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to pay $795,000, which is the highest I can go. Let me know if this is acceptable to you.

Bob, I appreciate you coming up in your offer, but $795,000 is still a bit below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down just a little more to $800,000, which is my absolute bottom line.  Let's make this deal happen.
